page.title: 05CLUBS IN CASTLETON
page.content: Castleton has 21,educational ,recreational,religous and philanthropic.Most meet in the village hall.Some are international or nation,others local.Church and chapel each have a religous group,both over 35 years old.There's a weekly Badmington Club and Band practice.for young people there's Cubs, Brownies ,Shell Club and Project Squirrel (Summer time).To help parents get out at night is a Baby sitting circle.For Pre-school childrenare a Playgroup and a toddlers group.Linked with national groups we have a radio Control car club(buggy club,Ladies Circle, Round Table,Cavers Society and W.I.The Historical Society and Weight Lifting Group flourish.Family day group raises cash for playing field equipment.
